    FOKUS questionnaire schema

Transform ballot type into prose string

Source: R/fokus.gen.R
ballot_type_prose.Rd

Transforms a ballot type into a full prose string representation.

Usage

ballot_type_prose(ballot_type = all_ballot_types, lang = c("de", "en"))

Arguments

ballot_type

Ballot type. One of

  • "referendum"

  • "election"

lang

Language. One of

  • "de"

  • "en"

Value

A character scalar.

See also

Other prose text functions: postal_dispatch_type_prose(), postal_dispatch_way_prose()

Examples

fokus::all_ballot_types |>
  purrr::map(~ tibble::tibble(type = .x,
                              de = fokus::ballot_type_prose(ballot_type = .x,
                                                            lang = "de"),
                              en = fokus::ballot_type_prose(ballot_type = .x,
                                                            lang = "en"))) %>%
  purrr::list_rbind()
#> # A tibble: 2 × 3
#>   type       de           en         
#>   <chr>      <chr>        <chr>      
#> 1 referendum Abstimmungen referendums
#> 2 election   Wahlen       elections
